articles.description: DAYTON, Ohio (WDTN) – The Montgomery County Coroner has identified the woman killed by a falling tree Sunday as 63-year-old Kimberly Short, of Englewood. The Montgomery County Sheriff’s Office said that Short was killed after a tree fell on her during severe …
